title: Week Four - Drink More Water and Reduce Liquid Calories

items.title: Experiments

defaultHabit.title: Drink Water and Reduce Liquid Calories

items: Set a water goal for the day - mark it on your bottle
Have water first thing in the morning
Drink a glass of water before eating
Have water instead of other liquids
Have hot drinks instead of juice/soft drinks
